sentences.en: He looks like a bum who's been drowning his sorrows in sleazy dives.
sentences.cn: 他看起来象个游手好闲之辈,整天泡在肮脏的下等酒吧借酒消愁.

sentences.en: Her sleazy gossip was very off - putting.
sentences.cn: 她那低级的闲话令人倒胃口.

sentences.en: I am not going to hang out with him anymore because he is sleazy.
sentences.cn: 因为他人品不佳,所以我再也不跟他出去了.

sentences.en: In recent weeks, you've heard plenty about the sleazy side of the subprime mortgage business.
sentences.cn: 几周, 很多媒体报道了次级按揭贷款业务的负面新闻.

sentences.en: Seven sleazy shysters in sharkskin suits sold sheared seal skins to seasick sailors.
sentences.cn: 七个穿着鲨鱼皮衣服的卑劣的论棍卖剪好的海豹皮给晕船的水手.

sentences.en: Seven sleazy shysters in sharkskin suits sold sheared sealskins to seasick sailors.
sentences.cn: 7个穿着鲨鱼皮外套的差劲的骗子把剪平的海豹皮卖给晕船的水手.

sentences.en: Some sleazy characters hang around casinos.
sentences.cn: 一些在赌场周围乱逛的骗子.

sentences.en: Spenser was a sleazy grifter who said he had a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 斯宾塞是个庸俗的骗子,他说他有很多钱.

sentences.en: The coat has a sleazy lining.
sentences.cn: 这件外衣的衬里质地又薄又差.

sentences.en: The ones I talked to weren't lotharios, and didn't seem sleazy either.
sentences.cn: 与我交谈的人并非好色之徒,似乎也不像不正派的人.

sentences.en: Why does a sleazy bastard like me like whores so much?
sentences.cn: 为什么像我这样的肮脏家伙如此迷恋妓女?

sentences.en: You'd better break up with your sleazy boyfriend before you get hurt.
sentences.cn: 在你受伤之前最好早点跟你那个差劲的男朋友分手.

words.tran_cn: 劣等品；卑鄙的人；肮脏；不名誉的状况
松松垮垮地进行；缓慢无力地移动
质地薄的；肮脏的；低级庸俗的；破烂的

trans.tran_cn: 肮脏的，质地薄的，低劣的
trans.tran_en: a sleazy place is dirty, cheap, or in bad condition
